name: A Quick Rejection: a rushed visual novel.
name_original: A Quick Rejection: a rushed visual novel.
description:
this is a visual novel i made in three weeks, it's kinda of a joke or something... but you have to use the kocho app in the app store or Google play to play this, even though I'm planning a android app release. 

(edit: it's released!!!.)

(Tags might be inaccurate!.)

enjoy my friends, don't take things seriously, and leave feedback in the comments to improve my writing style and anything that i did wrong on the tags and description.
